title: Nutella cake
ingredients: ['6 large eggs, separated', '1 pinch salt', '150g unsalted butter, softened', '400g Nutella®', '1 tablespoon Tia Maria®', '100g ground hazelnuts', '120g plain chocolate, melted', 'For the icing', '100g hazelnuts (optional)', '125ml double cream', '1 tablespoon Tia Maria®', '125g plain chocolate']
